item.title: Is recycle bins with? I’ll put in the wrong place making it hard for residence to open and shut when it’s windy we get loose rubbish flying down the street and we get a lot of homeless going through the bins., 12th February
item.description:
I’m constantly picking up rubbish outside my flat need putting somewhere else and a lot of other people using it for different kinds of rubbish which misses a recycle up

item.title: Secondary security light whole estate alleyway where puppies is really getting a lot of antisocial behaviour homeless waiting for drugs being noisy, 12th February
item.description:
This light needs fixing. It’s becoming a meeting place for the homeless littering and pulling cables out of sky dishes. either way in for Drugs causing lots of noise and keeping my elderly mother-in-law awake.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Grange Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Blocking entire footway almost every night, 11th February
item.description:
DKT-WUF. This footway has being entirely blocked by Lime bikes almost every single night for over one year. This causes great concern for the blind and visually impaired pedestrians who use this footway regularly. Please sanction your riders for these obstructions. Thank you for your attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Road, Shacklewell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes all over this section of road, 11th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crabtree Manorway North, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole on slip road to A13, 11th February
item.description:
There is a pot hole at the start of the Wennington slip road that joins the a13 towards lakeside. I cannot attach a photo as it’s not safe to get out in the car here or use my phone while driving, I have attached a screenshot of the location from Apple map and the pothole can be seen however it’s a lot worse now. This is going to cause a lot off issues because people are swerving it now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
